survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate attendees' networking experiences at professional conferences to improve future events.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities provided at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which of the following networking formats did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following networking formats did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional networking formats you would like to see at future conferences.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended response to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional networking formats you would like to see at future conferences.

questions.question_text: Did you make any meaningful professional connections during the conference?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/unsure question to gauge networking effectiveness.

script.question_text: Did you make any meaningful professional connections during the conference?

questions.question_text: What could be improved to enhance networking opportunities at future conferences?

script.question_text: What could be improved to enhance networking opportunities at future conferences?
